name: Holiday Rush 64
description:
Gameplay

Enjoy this festive down hill racer and drop all the presents from the sky while collecting all the coins as fast as you can!

Merry Christmas!

Controls
  • Move: WASD / Joystick on mobile
Features
  • 15 unique levels
  • Collect coins for achievements on mobile only
  • Christmas feeling!
Soon also available on Play Store
